description:
The day of the Inter-High has finally arrived! Sohoku High School is aiming for a second consecutive championship, Hakone Academy High school is looking to reclaim their throne, and Kyoto Fushimi High School is led by Midousuji as the nation`s strongest schools gather. As the race prepares to start, Kaburagi encounters a certain member of Hakone Academy High School...
Source: crunchyroll
